mapper.insert: insert into prj_material_buy (apply_department, apply_person, apply_list_code, contract_name_yi, task_list_code, cj_contract_code, cj_contract_name, apply_reason) values (#{applyDepartment}, #{applyPerson}, #{applyListCode}, #{contractNameYi}, #{taskListCode}, #{cjContractCode}, #{cjContractName}, #{applyReason})
